elements.text: You are responding to a text on your phone. It's taking you a long time to type a short response, and you wonder whether the recipient will be annoyed. You realize that the response at hand is not an emergency, and the recipient will be...

elements.name: Delayed Texting _Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
